verses.verse: And afterward <S%H310><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went in, <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Let <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may hold a feast <S%H2287><s%> unto me in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> is the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I should obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> to let <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> go? <S%H7971><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> neither <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3808><s%> will I let <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>

And they said, <S%H559><s%> The God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> hath met <S%H7122><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> us: let us go, <S%H1980><s%> we pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%> into the desert, <S%H4057><s%> and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God; <S%H430><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> he fall upon <S%H6293><s%> us with pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> or <S%H176><s%> with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> do ye, Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> let <S%H6544><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> from their works? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4639><s%> get <S%H1980><s%> you unto your burdens. <S%H5450><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> are many, <S%H7227><s%> and ye make them rest <S%H7673><s%> <S%H853><s%> from their burdens. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5450><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> <S%H853><s%> the taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and their officers, <S%H7860><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Ye shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> to make <S%H3835><s%> brick, <S%H3843><s%> as heretofore: <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%> let them <S%H1992><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> and gather <S%H7197><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> for themselves.

And the tale <S%H4971><s%> of the bricks, <S%H3843><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> did make <S%H6213><s%> heretofore, <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%> ye shall lay <S%H7760><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them; ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> diminish <S%H1639><s%> aught thereof: <S%H4480><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> be idle; <S%H7503><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> cry, <S%H6817><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Let us go <S%H1980><s%> and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to our God. <S%H430><s%>

Let there more work be laid <S%H3513><s%> <S%H5656><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the men, <S%H376><s%> that they may labor <S%H6213><s%> therein; and let them not <S%H408><s%> regard <S%H8159><s%> vain <S%H8267><s%> words. <S%H1697><s%>

And the taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> went out, <S%H3318><s%> and their officers, <S%H7860><s%> and they spoke <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> I will not <S%H369><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> you straw. <S%H8401><s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> ye, <S%H859><s%> get <S%H3947><s%> you straw <S%H8401><s%> where <S%H4480><s%> <S%H834><s%> ye can find <S%H4672><s%> it: yet <S%H3588><s%> not <S%H369><s%> aught <S%H1697><s%> of your work <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5656><s%> shall be diminished. <S%H1639><s%>

So the people <S%H5971><s%> were scattered abroad <S%H6327><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to gather <S%H7197><s%> stubble <S%H7179><s%> instead of straw. <S%H8401><s%>

And the taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> hasted <S%H213><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Fulfill <S%H3615><s%> your works, <S%H4639><s%> your daily <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3117><s%> tasks, <S%H1697><s%> as when <S%H834><s%> there was <S%H1961><s%> straw. <S%H8401><s%>

And the officers <S%H7860><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> had set <S%H7760><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them, were beaten, <S%H5221><s%> and demanded, <S%H559><s%> Wherefore <S%H4069><s%> have ye not <S%H3808><s%> fulfilled <S%H3615><s%> your task <S%H2706><s%> in making brick <S%H3835><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> yesterday <S%H8543><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> as heretofore? <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%>

Then the officers <S%H7860><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and cried <S%H6817><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> dealest <S%H6213><s%> thou thus <S%H3541><s%> with thy servants? <S%H5650><s%>

There is no <S%H369><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> unto thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> and they say <S%H559><s%> to us, Make <S%H6213><s%> brick: <S%H3843><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> thy servants <S%H5650><s%> are beaten; <S%H5221><s%> but the fault <S%H2398><s%> is in thine own people. <S%H5971><s%>

But he said, <S%H559><s%> Ye <S%H859><s%> are idle, <S%H7503><s%> ye are idle: <S%H7503><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> Let us go <S%H1980><s%> and do sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> therefore now, <S%H6258><s%> and work; <S%H5647><s%> for there shall no <S%H3808><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> you, yet shall ye deliver <S%H5414><s%> the tale <S%H8506><s%> of bricks. <S%H3843><s%>

And the officers <S%H7860><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did see <S%H7200><s%> that they were in evil <S%H7451><s%> case, after it was said, <S%H559><s%> Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> minish <S%H1639><s%> aught from your bricks <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3843><s%> of your daily <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3117><s%> task. <S%H1697><s%>

And they met <S%H6293><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> who stood <S%H5324><s%> in the way, <S%H7125><s%> as they came forth <S%H3318><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> look <S%H7200><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, and judge; <S%H8199><s%> because <S%H834><s%> ye have made <S%H853><s%> our savor <S%H7381><s%> to be abhorred <S%H887><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> to put <S%H5414><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> in their hand <S%H3027><s%> to slay <S%H2026><s%> us.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> wherefore <S%H4100><s%> hast thou so evil entreated <S%H7489><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people? <S%H5971><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> is it <S%H2088><s%> that thou hast sent <S%H7971><s%> me?

For since <S%H4480><s%> <S%H227><s%> I came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> in thy name, <S%H8034><s%> he hath done evil <S%H7489><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> people; <S%H5971><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> hast thou delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> at all. <S%H5337><s%>
